snippet: No matter how much discipline you think you have, automating good financial behavior will probably lead to more success than sheer willpower.
abstract: No matter how much discipline you think you have, automating good financial behavior will probably lead to more success than sheer willpower.
lead_paragraph: Carl Richards is a certified financial planner in Park City, Utah. His new book, "The Behavior Gap," was published earlier this year. His sketches are archived here on the Bucks blog.

headline.main: Your Mistaken Belief in Financial Willpower
